abilities.name: Grim Demeanour
abilities.rule: Each time a model in this unit makes an attack, add 1 to the Hit roll if this unit is below its Starting Strength, and add 1 to the Wound roll as well if this unit is Below Half-strength.

abilities.name: Death Korps Medi-pack
abilities.rule: At the start of your Command phase, if the bearer‚Äôs unit is below its Starting Strength, you can return up to D3 destroyed Death Korps Troopers to this unit (if this unit contains two models equipped with a Death Korps medi‚Äêpack, return up to D3+1 destroyed Death Korps Troopers to this unit instead).

abilities.name: Vox-caster
abilities.rule: Each time you target the bearer‚Äôs unit with a Stratagem, roll one D6, adding 1 to the result if there are one or more friendly **OFFICER** models within 6": on a 5+, you gain 1CP.

wargear_abilities.name: Death Korps Medi-pack
wargear_abilities.rule: At the start of your Command phase, if the bearer‚Äôs unit is below its Starting Strength, you can return up to D3 destroyed Death Korps Troopers to this unit (if this unit contains two models equipped with a Death Korps medi‚Äêpack, return up to D3+1 destroyed Death Korps Troopers to this unit instead).

wargear_options: ‚ñ† Any number of Death Korps Watchmasters can each replace their laspistol and chainsword with 1 boltgun and 1 close combat weapon.
‚ñ† Any number of Death Korps Watchmasters can each replace their chainsword with 1 power weapon.

‚ñ† For every 10 models in this unit, up to 2 Death Korps Troopers can each have their lasgun replaced with one of the following*:
‚ó¶ 1 flamer
‚ó¶ 1 grenade launcher
‚ó¶ 1 long-las
‚ó¶ 1 meltagun
‚ó¶ 1 plasma gun

* You cannot select the same option more than once per unit unless it contains 20 models, in which case you cannot select the same option more than twice per unit.
‚ñ† For every 10 models in this unit, 1 Death Korps Trooper equipped with a lasgun can be equipped with 1 Death Korps medi-pack (that model‚Äôs lasgun cannot be replaced).**

‚ñ† Any number of Death Korps Watchmasters can each have their laspistol replaced with one of the following:
‚ó¶ 1 bolt pistol
‚ó¶ 1 plasma pistol

‚ñ† For every 10 models in this unit, 1 Death Korps Trooper equipped with a lasgun can be equipped with 1 vox-caster (that model‚Äôs lasgun cannot be replaced).**

** A model can only take one of these options.
unit_composition:
‚ñ† **1 Death Korps Watchmaster and 9 Death Korps Troopers**
OR
‚ñ† **2 Death Korps Watchmasters and 18 Death Korps Troopers**

**Every Death Korps Watchmaster is equipped with:** laspistol; chainsword.
**Every Death Korps Trooper is equipped with:** lasgun; close combat weapon.

*This unit can have up to two Leader units attached to it, provided no more than one of those units is a* **COMMAND SQUAD** *unit. If it does, and this Bodyguard unit is destroyed, the Leader units attached to it become separate units, with their original Starting Strengths.*
